quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
name: St. Jerome

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
name: Buddha

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
name: Magdalena Neuner

quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
name: Henry Ford

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
name: George Allen, Sr.

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
name: Richard Bach

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
name: Epictetus

quote: I follow three rules: Do the right thing, do the best you can, and always show people you care.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: Memories are the best things in life, I think.
name: Romy Schneider

quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.
name: Michael LeBoeuf

quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
name: Lao Tzu

quote: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
name: Ashley Olsen

quote: The best way to solve problems and to fight against war is through dialogue.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
name: Paul Valery

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
name: Aristotle

quote: I look my best when I'm totally free, on holiday, walking on the beach.
name: Rosamund Pike

quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: Just find what works for you, what style suits you best, and just be confident enough to rock it.
name: Odell Beckham, Jr.

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Good manners will open doors that the best education cannot.
name: Clarence Thomas

quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The best way to celebrate the holidays is with some delicious food.
name: Rachel Hollis

quote: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day.
name: Justin Bieber

quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading.
name: David Bailey

quote: Modeling is the best because you have to look hot, which comes easy to me, you know. I'm blessed with that.
name: Ashton Kutcher

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
name: Conor Oberst

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
name: Karen Salmansohn

quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
name: David Ogilvy

quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
name: Willa Cather

quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.
name: Euripides

quote: The best education I have ever received was through travel.
name: Lisa Ling

quote: Perfection is impossible; just strive to do your best.
name: Angela Watson

quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: My dad has given me the best gift anyone has ever given me. He gave me wings to fly.
name: Adria Arjona

quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
name: Aristotle

quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Honesty is the best policy.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The best career advice I've gotten is to stay focused, keep moving forward.
name: Tyga

quote: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
name: Ralph Nader

quote: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world.
name: Carrie Underwood

quote: I'm just here for good times, man. I want people to have the best time ever. Especially if they're around me.
name: Travis Scott

quote: If you work hard and you do your best, you can do anything.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
name: Bobby Seale

quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
name: Socrates

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: For much of my life, the Navy was the only world I knew. It is still the world I know best and love most.
name: John McCain

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
name: Ivana Trump

quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I try to say I love you in a million different ways. That's what I aspire to do. That's what I do best.
name: Christine McVie

quote: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
name: Carl Jung

quote: One thing I've learned is when you find a best friend in this life, you better hang on.
name: Jim Nabors

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: Like love, breakfast is best when made at home.
name: Gina Barreca

quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: I still believe that 'No Smoking' is one of my best performances.
name: John Abraham

quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: Solitude is creativity's best friend, and solitude is refreshment for our souls.
name: Naomi Judd

quote: When a man's best friend is his dog, that dog has a problem.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: The roots of true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
name: Harold Taylor

quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The best route is to stay humble and stay true to yourself.
name: Rich the Kid

quote: Walking is man's best medicine.
name: Hippocrates

quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: What matters is getting the best out of the squad you have.
name: Claudio Ranieri

quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
name: Athenaeus

quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
name: Eddie Vedder

quote: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
name: Charles Darwin

quote: Surfing waves of water or clouds of powder snow is the best feeling on earth.
name: Hannah Teter

quote: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Old friends are best.
name: John Selden

quote: I never had a policy; I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
name: John Webster

quote: Candy is childhood, the best and bright moments you wish could have lasted forever.
name: Dylan Lauren

quote: Women have to find their own personality, their own style, and what suits them the best.
name: Francois Nars

quote: 'Chef' doesn't mean that you're the best cook, it simply means 'boss.'
name: Tom Colicchio

quote: I've been searching for ways to heal myself, and I've found that kindness is the best way.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: The best way to heal a broken heart, it turns out, is to find a way to move past the hurt.
name: Mary Kay Andrews

quote: My sister and I truly are best friends.
name: Solange Knowles

quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
name: Steve Prefontaine

quote: Beer, it's the best damn drink in the world.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: The most important thing is, whatever you do decide to choose, take it seriously and do your best.
name: Tom Sturridge

quote: I have a best friend in my life who I know is my soulmate.
name: Lili Reinhart

quote: I still see Prince George as my nephew, and I just want to be the best uncle possible.
name: James William Middleton

quote: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.
name: Euripides

quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: To wake up to the sound of my son saying 'Mama, mama!' It's the best sound ever.
name: Miranda Kerr

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
name: Aristotle

quote: The best way out is always through.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: I can only control my own performance. If I do my best, then I can feel good at the end of the day.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Don't think too much. The best pictures come naturally.
name: Chiara Ferragni

quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: John Locke

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
name: Buddha

quote: The best form of government is that which is most likely to prevent the greatest sum of evil.
name: James Monroe

quote: Not voting is disrespecting the best of what this nation stands for.
name: Thomas Hauser

quote: I'm going to use all my tools, my God-given ability, and make the best life I can with it.
name: LeBron James

quote: The best comfort food will always be greens, cornbread, and fried chicken.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
name: Jim Elliot

quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
name: Diane Ackerman

quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
name: Joe DiMaggio

quote: Good skin is the best foundation for your makeup.
name: Holland Roden

quote: I find that it's best to take one step at a time and cross each bridge as they come to you.
name: Michael Stuhlbarg

quote: I think my mom put it best. She said, 'Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.'
name: Paul Walker

quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: It's the best feeling when you wake up and it's warm and cozy, and you don't have to go to work.
name: Emmy Rossum

quote: Just live life. That's the best way to learn how to act. Just live.
name: Rory Culkin

quote: I'm not the best person at putting words together. I can't give you the melody. But I might inspire somebody.
name: Meek Mill

quote: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: James Joyce

quote: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
name: Homer

quote: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
name: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: At the end of the day, my goal was to be the best hacker.
name: Kevin Mitnick

quote: Sometimes a loss is the best thing that can happen. It teaches you what you should have done next time.
name: Snoop Dogg

quote: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: Win or lose, I believe in giving my best and that is what I always do.
name: Lin Dan

quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
name: Tryon Edwards

quote: Nothing can replace sleep, but coffee can do it best. I love coffee.
name: Kelley O'Hara

quote: When you start hiding things away, that's when the darkness creeps up. Sunlight is the best disinfectant.
name: Steve Kazee

quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
name: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Sometimes you get the best light from a burning bridge.
name: Don Henley

quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I'm not perfect, but I do my best.
name: Jessie James Decker

quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst; expect the best; and take what comes.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: With the Union my best and dearest earthly hopes are entwined.
name: Franklin Pierce

quote: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
name: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: The best defense against usurpatory government is an assertive citizenry.
name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: A historical event represents the best and the worst of that moment.
name: Rachel Kushner

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy.
name: Domenico Dolce

quote: When you meet your best friend in real life, or you meet your soulmate, you just know it, and you feel it.
name: Lili Reinhart

quote: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Everybody is different. Everybody has different styles. Just do it the best way you know how.
name: Vince Carter

quote: Whenever I dream about flying, it's the best feeling in the world.
name: Kate Mara

quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
name: George S. Patton

quote: Friendships that have stood the test of time and change are surely best.
name: Joseph Parry

quote: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
name: Linus Pauling

quote: In the end, it's a mental maturity to let your best come out.
name: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: I'm just myself. That's the best way to put it.
name: Post Malone

quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: The portrait I do best is of the person I know best.
name: Nadar

quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
name: Epictetus

quote: The best way to guarantee a loss is to quit.
name: Morgan Freeman

quote: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
name: Moliere

quote: If I'm going to be a caged bird, I'll sing the best song I can.
name: Wes Craven

quote: The corruption of the best things gives rise to the worst.
name: David Hume

quote: The best solutions are often simple, yet unexpected.
name: Julian Casablancas

quote: My best personality trait that I think I'm very approachable. And my worst is that I can be moody.
name: Enrique Iglesias

quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: By all these lovely tokens September days are here, With summer's best of weather And autumn's best of cheer.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The best part is still ahead of me - I haven't experienced my 'good old days' yet.
name: Luther Vandross

quote: You're always in love with your best friend. That's why you're best friends.
name: Katie Stevens

quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The best thing I did was to choose the right heroes.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: I always find the mirror in the dressing room is where the best artists are.
name: John Lydon

quote: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships.
name: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: The best way to look at any business is from the standpoint of the clients.
name: Jamie Dimon

quote: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry.
name: Roger Staubach

quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
name: Calvin Klein

quote: Sunglasses are a migraine sufferer's best friend.
name: Cindy McCain

quote: I feel the best after a workout - I'm sweaty and exhausted, but it also gives me an energy I really like.
name: Hilary Rhoda

quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
name: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Just try to be the best you can be; never cease trying to be the best you can be. That's in your power.
name: John Wooden

quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
name: Lord Byron

quote: The best way to learn is by doing. The only way to build a strong work ethic is getting your hands dirty.
name: Alex Spanos

quote: I believe that the best cameraman is one who recognizes the source, the story, as the basis of his work.
name: James Wong Howe

quote: Luck marches with those who give their very best.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I'm not sure if I can swagger anymore, but I can limp with the best of them.
name: Burt Reynolds

quote: When you are entrusted with an assignment, you do your best.
name: Tu Youyou

quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
name: Horatio Nelson

quote: The best proof of love is trust.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: The best way a mentor can prepare another leader is to expose him or her to other great people.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: If I can bring happiness to people all around the world, then I will try my best to do so.
name: Tom Holland

quote: The best way to look stylish on a budget is to try second-hand, bargain hunting, and vintage.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: I did the best I could, and in some arenas, my best was not good enough. I've made some bad choices.
name: Amy Grant

quote: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil; in its worst state, an intolerable one.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
name: George Gershwin

quote: The monster was the best friend I ever had.
name: Boris Karloff

quote: Scouting rises within you and inspires you to put forth your best.
name: Juliette Gordon Low

quote: Like what you do, and then you will do your best.
name: Katherine Johnson

quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
name: David Icke

quote: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.
name: George Lopez

quote: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed; it just feels like you are home when you are in it.
name: Ashton Kutcher

quote: The calling of the humanities is to make us truly human in the best sense of the word.
name: J. Irwin Miller

quote: I would like to be remembered as someone who did the best she could with the talent she had.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Best thing that's happened this year? Maybe Hostel. It was a great experience. I loved it.
name: Jay Hernandez

quote: My dad's my best mate, and he always will be.
name: Cher Lloyd

quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
name: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: Practice is the best of all instructors.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Happiness is nothing but good health and freedom, and money is the single best way you can buy your freedom.
name: Scott Adams

quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: In matters of conscience, first thoughts are best. In matters of prudence, last thoughts are best.
name: Robert Hall

quote: In every aspect of life, have a game plan, and then do your best to achieve it.
name: Alan Kulwicki

quote: The best way to persuade people is with your ears - by listening to them.
name: Dean Rusk

quote: Science is the best idea humans have ever had. The more people who embrace that idea, the better.
name: Bill Nye

quote: The best way to find out whether you're on the right path? Stop looking at the path.
name: Marcus Buckingham

quote: The making of friends who are real friends, is the best token we have of a man's success in life.
name: Edward Everett Hale

quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
name: Jane Austen

quote: I just feel my best when I'm all glammed up.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: The best meal at my restaurant is the whole right side of the menu.
name: Junior Seau

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
name: Dean Acheson

quote: The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito.
name: Benito Mussolini

quote: The pursuit of happiness is in our Constitution. We're all entitled to have the best we can.
name: Loretta Swit

quote: I love dressing up. It's the best part of being a girl, I think.
name: Emma Roberts

quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Nature scarcely ever gives us the very best; for that we must have recourse to art.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: But men are men; the best sometimes forget.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: I can only do my thing and do the best that I can.
name: Roman Reigns

quote: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
name: John Wooden

quote: If you try to do your best there is no failure.
name: Mike Farrell

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: I am a gentleman. My natural inclination is to be on my best behavior.
name: Joe Wilson

quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
name: John Wooden

quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Living well is the best revenge.
name: George Herbert

quote: I just wanted to be a businessman, and to me, the best way to understand business was to be an accountant.
name: Aubrey McClendon

quote: Having an aim is the key to achieving your best.
name: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: I genuinely want to do my best every day, and I genuinely want to enjoy life every day.
name: Landon Donovan

quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
name: Will Rogers

quote: The best teacher is very interactive.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Every pilot thinks they're the best pilot in the world. I think I'm the best pilot.
name: Gordon Bethune

quote: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Our body is the only one we've been given, so we need to maintain it; we need to give it the best nutrition.
name: Trudie Styler

quote: To look and feel my best, I watch my calories and exercise.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: Momentum begets momentum, and the best way to start is to start.
name: Gil Penchina

quote: God knows I gave my best in baseball at all times and no man on earth can truthfully judge me otherwise.
name: Shoeless Joe Jackson

quote: If you're going to be a winner in life, you have to constantly go beyond your best.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Parenting is one of the best management training programs there is.
name: Irene Rosenfeld

quote: There is always some kid who may be seeing me for the first time. I owe him my best.
name: Joe DiMaggio

quote: Our goal has never been to make the most. It's always been to make the best.
name: Tim Cook

quote: The best kind of parent you can be is to lead by example.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
name: Alan Kay

quote: Letting your mind play is the best way to solve problems.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: My best hostess tip is to have good food and really good music!
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Simple jewelry is best - bigger pieces get in the way when I'm baking.
name: Christina Tosi

quote: When the gate drops, it's time to try and execute the best you can.
name: Nate Holland

quote: Most of life is showing up. You do the best you can, which varies from day to day.
name: Regina Brett

quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
name: Kit Harington

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I'm always awoken with the joyous sound and laughter of my son. That's the best part about being a mom.
name: Jane Krakowski

quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The things I want to know are in books; my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Common looking people are the best in the world: that is the reason the Lord makes so many of them.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Do the best that you can in the place where you are, and be kind.
name: Scott Nearing

quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
name: Sarah Orne Jewett

quote: I think the best riffs and the best songs come when you're jamming and having a good time.
name: Scott Ian

quote: Perhaps nature is our best assurance of immortality.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I always want to find the best burger in town.
name: Dennis Quaid

quote: Hunger is the best pickle.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: My best vacation memory is getting barreled at the beach in Hawaii.
name: Troy Polamalu

quote: I have learned that not diamonds but divorce lawyers are a girl's best friend.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: At the end of the day, you know yourself best.
name: Abigail Johnson

quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
name: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
name: Voltaire

quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
name: William Osler

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
name: John Wooden

quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Genius always gives its best at first; prudence, at last.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I believe that democracy is the best guarantor for peace and cooperation among nations.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: Obviously, the highest type of efficiency is that which can utilize existing material to the best advantage.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Even between the best of friends, mistakes and misunderstandings can happen.
name: Avigdor Lieberman

quote: Participation, I think, or one of the best methods of educating.
name: Tom Glazer

quote: Sweat equity is the best equity.
name: Mark Cuban

quote: The best vision is insight.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
name: George Halas

quote: Look your best - who said love is blind?
name: Mae West

quote: The best gifts are those we not only cherish but put to use.
name: Les Brown

quote: I love being in love. It's the best feeling in the world.
name: Ranveer Singh

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
name: George Orwell

quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it.
name: Pat Riley

quote: I think that the best training a top manager can be engaged in is management by example.
name: Carlos Ghosn

quote: The days you work are the best days.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.
name: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
name: Christopher Walken

quote: The most erroneous stories are those we think we know best - and therefore never scrutinize or question.
name: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: The best anti-aging product is a great, natural-looking hair color, especially when you're graying.
name: Bobbi Brown

quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
name: Josh Billings

quote: My face is oblong. But the best grooming is confidence.
name: T. J. Miller

quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
name: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: The man who has done his best has done everything.
name: Charles M. Schwab

quote: Becoming a mother has turned my world upside down, but in a really good way - it's the best.
name: Katherine Kelly

quote: The best Qualification of a Prophet is to have a good Memory.
name: George Savile

quote: If I'm not the best aunt in America, then I don't know what's going on.
name: Jenny Slate

quote: Best to live lightly, unthinkingly.
name: Sophocles

quote: I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness, starving hysterical naked.
name: Allen Ginsberg

quote: I'd like to think I haven't done my best yet.
name: Don Johnson

quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
name: Robert Bresson

quote: The best things in life are silly.
name: Scott Adams

quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: I did my best, and God did the rest.
name: Hattie McDaniel

quote: One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
name: Eric Butterworth

quote: We have the best government that money can buy.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I like to stay happy, and I like to live life light and make the best of life.
name: Ciara

quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The best thing commercially, which is the worst artistically, by and large, is the most successful.
name: Orson Welles

quote: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Wise and humane management of the patient is the best safeguard against infection.
name: Florence Nightingale

quote: Our best thoughts come from others.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best lack all conviction, while the worst are full of passionate intensity.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Do your best, one shot at a time and then move on. Remember that golf is just a game.
name: Nancy Lopez

quote: I love to see new things, and I love to learn. I always learn so much when I travel - that's the best thing.
name: Larry Fitzgerald

quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Anytime you ride against the best in the world, it becomes a learning process.
name: Bonnie Blair

quote: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.
name: Celia Imrie

quote: Since day one, since the first time I touched the pen, I wanted to be the best at what I do.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Hands-on experience is the best way to learn about all the interdisciplinary aspects of robotics.
name: Rodney Brooks

quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: The best advice comes from people who don't give advice.
name: Matthew McConaughey

quote: My siblings are my best friends.
name: America Ferrera

quote: When you're the best, you only want to surround yourself with the best.
name: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I am determined and never give up. Ever. I always do my best.
name: Seth Rollins

quote: The best path through life is the highway.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: I am my own muse, the subject I know best.
name: Frida Kahlo

quote: I have no regrets, because I've done everything I could to the best of my ability.
name: Robert Redford

quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Though sleep is called our best friend, it is a friend who often keeps us waiting!
name: Jules Verne

quote: No matter the bad things that happened in past time, let's try to live the best we can now.
name: Ziggy Marley

quote: You get the best effort from others not by lighting a fire beneath them, but by building a fire within.
name: Bob Nelson

quote: The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
name: Doug Larson

quote: It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Negligence is the rust of the soul, that corrodes through all her best resolves.
name: Owen Feltham

quote: I've always felt that specialization is best left to the insects.
name: Gregory Benford

quote: Never say never. The things that you don't plan are the best. I'm a very spontaneous person.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: For me, the best vacation is just relaxing on the couch!
name: Scotty McCreery

quote: Thinking well to be wise: planning well, wiser: doing well wisest and best of all.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: My biggest regret is rolling in regret. It is best to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and move on.
name: Andie MacDowell

quote: The advice of the elders to young men is very apt to be as unreal as a list of the hundred best books.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Hard conditions of life are indispensable to bringing out the best in human personality.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: I really love being busy because I am - feel like I am at my best when I am busy.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: I feel that gender balance in the work environment is actually the best recipe for success.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: My 'fear' is my substance, and probably the best part of me.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: The idea of losing your best friend, basically, is the worst thing in world.
name: Phoebe Waller-Bridge

quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.
name: Mark Russell

quote: The best cartoons have no words at all - just the image pops out.
name: Jeff MacNelly

quote: He serves his party best who serves his country best.
name: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Sometimes a little heartbreak is a lesson, and the best thing to do is just learn the lesson.
name: Jon Voight

quote: The worst men often give the best advice.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
name: Mae West

quote: Once you are labeled 'the best' you want to stay up there, and you can't do it by loafing around.
name: Larry Bird

quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
name: Art Buchwald

quote: My husband is pretty particular about his cars. In his opinion, the Mercedes are the best of the best.
name: Lauren Lee Smith

quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
name: Thomas Sowell

quote: Every person I have met who has gone vegan says it is the best decision they have ever made.
name: Lewis Hamilton

quote: Some of the best conversations I've had are sitting around a camp fire.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list.
name: Jasper Carrott

quote: If you want to meet a woman, it's best just to smile and say hi.
name: Karen McDougal

quote: Nerves can be useful, as they sharpen you up, make you determined to try your hardest and do your best.
name: Stephen Cole

quote: The best portraits are those in which there is a slight mixture of caricature.
name: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Nobody is gonna love you like you. You're gonna be your best salesman.
name: T.I.

quote: When I wake up in a bad mood, I try not to stay in one. Learn to make the best of what you have.
name: Faith Hill

quote: I just want to make the best music of all time with my best friends.
name: Chris Martin

quote: With horns and a full rhythm section, the drums always looked like the best seat in the house.
name: Levon Helm

quote: As far as accessories are concerned, I think it is always best to be as minimalist as possible.
name: Alice Temperley

quote: Horror movies are the best date movies. There's no wondering, 'When do I put my arm around her?'
name: Eli Roth

quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I am not trying my best because it is the Olympics. I try my best always.
name: Kim Yuna

quote: I think some of the best actors ever were little kids.
name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: Yup, the toilet is my best friend before a show.
name: Eric Carr

quote: The best person to get something done is a busy person.
name: Mark Burnett

quote: I have two sisters, and we are the best of friends.
name: Laura Carmichael

quote: A professional is someone who can do his best work when he doesn't feel like it.
name: Alistair Cooke

quote: The best thing to do with the best things in life is to give them up.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: He who has done his best for his own time has lived for all times.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
name: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Usually, the stuff that's your best idea or work is going to be attacked the most.
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
name: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quote: Just do what you do best.
name: Red Auerbach

quote: Next to acquiring good friends, the best acquisition is that of good books.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
name: Fred Durst

quote: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
name: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: I am the best in baseball.
name: Reggie Jackson

quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Life is best when you are in love.
name: Michael Moriarty

quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
name: Max Beerbohm
